title: Cha Cha Cha
resume: Cha Cha Cha was an Argentine sketch comedy television program aired in the 1990s on América TV, starring Alfredo Casero, Fabio Alberti, Diego Capusotto, and others. It was characterized by absurd humour, sometimes bordering on the surreal. In 2012 it was announced by Casero that the show will return as a motion picture.

It was characterized by absurd humour, sometimes bordering on the surreal. In 2012 it was announced by Casero that the show will return as a motion picture.
